item.title: DIY Cleaning and Craft Organization: 1/24/17
item.author: CBTV Live
item.description:
DIY Cleaning and Craft Organization 1/24/17
The sun is out and Courtney and Liana are ready to clean and tidy your craft space. This video originally appeared on Facebook Live on January 24, 2017.

item.title: Handmade Soap
item.author: Lindsey Stone
item.description:
In one great smelling afternoon, you can learn the basics of cold process soap making and make enough soap for everyone on your holiday list. Lindsey from Clean Getaway Soap demystifies the process and walks you through a batch of soap from start to finish. Along the way you’ll learn how to safely mix soap, add color and scent, and finish with stamps and gift wrap. Download the recipe to follow along.

What you will learn:
— Prepping and measuring ingredients
— Soap molding
— Cutting bars of soap
— Customizing and packaging for gift giving

item.title: DIY Holiday Party Hair-Do
item.author: Shana Astrachan
item.description: Between festive parties and general merry-making, the holidays are a perfect time to try something fun and playful with your hair. In this class, hair and makeup expert Shana will show you how to do an easy braided hairstyle that will take you from day to night. As a bonus, you will also learn how to curl your hair (and keep the curl going strong all night long).

item.title: DIY Holiday Party Makeup
item.author: Shana Astrachan
item.description: Holiday parties provide the perfect excuse to experiment with makeup, and in this class, Shana shares how to accomplish a sleek, retro look at home. You will learn a twist on the classic “cat eye” as well as tips on applying a bright, bold lip color. Pair your look with a glittery frock and you’ll have your holiday style down pat.

item.title: Homemade Apothecary
item.author: Amy Karol
item.description:
Make your own lip balm, facial oil, deodorant, and more, by looking no further than your pantry or local health food store. Amy expertly demystifies the ingredients you need and offers recipes and ratios that result in delicious smelling, high-quality beauty products that will leave your skin and body radiant.

What you will learn:
— Making your own deodorant, hair spray, lip balm, facial toner, facial oil and cleansing oil
— Packaging and adding labels
